Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic

Class SimpleURLClassLoader

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ClassLoader
java.security.SecureClassLoader
java.net.URLClassLoader
chav1961.purelib.basic.SimpleURLClassLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class SimpleURLClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader

This class is a replacement to early existed class ClassLoaderWrapper, because Java 9 doesn't allow to support it's functionality.

Since:
0.0.4
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Details

    • createClass

      public java.lang.Class<?> createClass​(java.lang.String className, byte[] content) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Create class by it's name and content

      Parameters:
      className - class name to create
      content - class file content to create class from
      Returns:
      class created
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - class name is null or empty or content is null or too short

    • createClass

      @Deprecated public java.lang.Class<?> createClass​(byte[] content) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Deprecated.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • createClass

      public java.lang.Class<?> createClass​(java.lang.String className, java.io.Reader content) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException

      Create class by it's name and bytecode assembler content

      Parameters:
      className - class name to create
      content - reader containing bytecode assembler
      Returns:
      class created
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - reader is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - class name is null or empty
      java.io.IOException - when any problems during class loading and definition were detected
